Le site présente également la grille horaire des émissions, des blogues technos, des capsules vidéo, des concours, des fonds d'écran et plus encore.

Site.name: ABC.com
Site.Description: The American Broadcasting Company (ABC) is an American commercial broadcasting television network.

Site.name: CTV News
Site.Description: CTV News.

Site.name: CTV Local News
Site.Description: CTV Local News.

Site.name: Discovery Channel Canada
Site.Description: Canadian TV Channel dedicated to documentaries about popular science, technology, and history.

Site.name: The Comedy Network
Site.Description: Canada's first specialty comedy service, The Comedy Network airs comedy of all kinds, 24-hours-a-day. Launched in October 1997, The Comedy Network broadcasts, uncut and uncensored, an eclectic mix of scripted, stand-up, sketch, improv, and animated comedy - as well as topical comedy talk shows, game shows and classic situation comedies.

Site.name: Space
Site.Description: SPACE is Canada’s national science fiction, fantasy and horror channel. Look no further for your fix of the paranormal, edgy, scary, creepy and fun! SPACE is the station for all those who dare to challenge their imagination.

Site.name: Fashion Television
Site.Description: FashionTelevisionChannel (FT) is Canada's first and only 24-hour English language fashion channel dedicated to the world of art, architecture, photography, and design.

Site.name: TSN
Site.Description: TSN is Canada's leading English language sports TV channel.

Site.name: BNN
Site.Description: Business News Network is Canada’s only all business and financial news channel.

Site.name: Global TV
Site.Description: Global Television reaches almost 100% of Canadians and is the online destination for Global Entertainment show information, episodes, web exclusives and more!

Site.name: History Television
Site.Description: History Television captivates Canadian audiences with gripping stories about the people and events that have shaped our world.

Site.name: The Food Network
Site.Description: Foodnetwork.ca is the destination for Canadians for all things food-related.

Site.name: HGTV Canada
Site.Description: www.HGTV.ca is the online destination for home and garden information. The website is home to helpful articles, do-it-yourself project plans, expert advice, interactive quizzes, time-saving etools, information about HGTV programs and hosts, and much more. Informative, interesting, fun, and interactive, HGTV.ca is a must-click destination for home and garden enthusiasts. As well, the website offers a popular biweekly newsletter filled with advice, promotional opportunities and more.

Site.name: Showcase
Site.Description: Big. Bold. Hits. With a top-rated line-up of hit series, breakout cable exclusives and big-ticket movies, Showcase is a powerhouse of TV’s best. From the off-beat characters in House, the unconventional storylines of Weeds and the chemistry-fuelled Bones, to Hollywood heavy-hitters Superbad and I Am Legend, Showcase delivers the best and most colourful collection of television.

Site.name: Slice
Site.Description: With highly addictive, must-see entertainment, Slice™ is the juicy channel women have been waiting for. Targeting viewers with an attitude found nowhere else in the lifestyle television landscape, Slice™ brings an unapologetic attitude to topics that matter to women – family, fashion, relationships, celebrity, finances and gossip – to name just a few.

Site.name: TVtropolis
Site.Description: TVtropolis is the home of back-to-back, recent iconic TV series celebrating the shows and stars that have defined pop culture. Favourites including Seinfeld, Friends, Family Guy, Frasier, That 70’s Show, Everybody Loves Raymond, and King of Queens make TVtropolis a TV lover’s destination.

Site.name: DIY Network Canada
Site.Description: DIY Network Canada is the go-to destination for rip-up, knock-out home improvement television.

Site.name: TVO

Site.name: TVO Parents
Site.Description: TVO Parents brings together parents, care-givers, and education experts from across Ontario (Canada) in a welcoming, online community.

Site.name: Treehouse TV
Site.Description: Treehouse TV is a Canadian English language cable television specialty channel with programming targeted towards preschoolers.

Site.name: YTV
Site.Description: YTV is a Canadian English-language cable television specialty channel aimed at kids and their families. If a show is crazy, cool, clever and funny, chances are it’s on YTV! With shows like SpongeBob SquarePants, iCarly, and The Next Star - plus the latest and greatest movies – YTV is family headquarters!
